duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform specific job functions as they relate to work orders
Conversant with relevant work techniques, including insulation material handling and metal banding fabrication
Ensure operational safety of all equipment and compliance with safety regulations
Travel as required for on-site installations and maintenance

education_certification.credential: Preferred: Combined knowledge & experience handling mineral wool, glass wool, calcium silicate, aerogel, cryogel, pyrogel, etc.
Preferred: Combined knowledge & experience fabricating & attaching aluminum-stainless steel jacking & metal bandings
Preferred: NCCER Insulation Plus certification (Qualified Operator)
